long_description: Light up your campsite with the warm glow of the Coleman CPX(TM) 6 Classic Family lantern. High-quality Cree(R) LED outputs 350 lumens up to 30 ft. on the high setting; LED lasts a lifetime, so it will never need to be replaced. 4 D batteries (sold separately) provide 15 hrs. of runtime on high and 125 hrs. on low. Lantern can also be powered by the Coleman CPX 6 rechargeable battery pack (sold separately), thereby eliminating the need to continually buy batteries. Water- and impact-resistant construction keeps the lantern running on your many outdoor adventures. Carry the Coleman CPX(TM) 6 Classic Family lantern around your campsite with the large handle.
short_description: Light up your campsite with the warm glow of the Coleman CPX(TM) 6 Classic Family lantern.
